fields.title: Spanish Latte
fields.description: Our spanish latte is made up two shots of espresso, steamed milk and sweetner, with thin layer of frothed milk on top.

fields.title: Latte
fields.description: Our latte is made up of 1/5 shots of espresso, steamed milk and no sweetner, with thin layer of frothed milk on top.

fields.title: Cortado
fields.description: Our cortado is made up of 1/5 shots of espresso, steamed milk with options for sweetner, with thin layer of frothed milk on top.

fields.title: Salted Caramel
fields.description: Our Salted Caramel is made up of 2 shots of espresso, steamed milk with Salted Caramel flavors, with thin layer of frothed milk on top.

fields.title: Piccollo
fields.description: Our Salted Caramel is made up of 2 shots of espresso, steamed milk with Salted Caramel flavors, with thin layer of frothed milk on top.

fields.title: Cortado Spanish

fields.title: ESpresso

fields.title: Flat White
fields.description: Our Salted Caramel is made up of 2 shots of espresso, steamed milk with Salted Caramel flavors, with thin layer of frothed milk on top.

fields.title: V60
fields.description: The taste of V60 coffee is clean, smooth, and complex at the same time, especially with lighter roast coffees. And we serve both HOT/COLD

fields.title: Americano
fields.description: The coffee is clean, smooth, and heavy body at the same time, it's prepared with Espresso with HOT/COLD water

fields.title: Dark Mocha
fields.description: The coffee is clean, smooth, and heavy body at the same time, it's prepared with Espresso with HOT/COLD water
